text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Graduation Scene Backdrop - Size 6 Ft. X 6 Ft.

Item keywords:
Perfect for graduation party
Use it for your picture wall
Ready to Hang
Size - 6 ft x 6ft.
text.Response A: This is a backdrop of a graduation scene. You can use it at a graduation party to take photos with your friends and family. It is 6 feet by 6 feet, so it is big enough for many people to stand in front of it and take pictures together. It is ready to hang up when you receive it.
text.Response B: This gorgeous graduation scene backdrop is perfect for decorating your party and taking great pictures. It is ready to hang and is a generous size of 6ft x 6ft.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

150.displayed_text:
Prompt

You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Graduation Scene Backdrop - Size 6 Ft. X 6 Ft.

Item keywords:
Perfect for graduation party
Use it for your picture wall
Ready to Hang
Size - 6 ft x 6ft.

Response A

This is a backdrop of a graduation scene. You can use it at a graduation party to take photos with your friends and family. It is 6 feet by 6 feet, so it is big enough for many people to stand in front of it and take pictures together. It is ready to hang up when you receive it.

Response B

This gorgeous graduation scene backdrop is perfect for decorating your party and taking great pictures. It is ready to hang and is a generous size of 6ft x 6ft.
